plot: Pig Business documents Marchioness, Tracy Worcester's four year investigation into the intensive pig farming industry. The film reveals the devastating effects intensive pig farming is having on the environment, the health and welfare of agricultural communities, the quality of our food and animal welfare.   Written by  Claudia Bicen
